name: SOCIETY OF CHILDREN PUBLIC SCHOOL
briefDescription: Our Organization running school for poor student and handicapped.Children Public Sr. Sec. School is affiliated to the All India Central Board of Education(CBSE). It is a co-educational boarding school with children studying in it from play group to XII. We offer both science & commerce stream at +2 level. We are the first in district to introduce smart class system. We have congenial environment well equipped class rooms, laboratories, library, etc. Above all a band of devoted, dedicated, knowledgeable affectionate teachers who have extraordinary zest for life,
